content: the pattern is free because there was no test knitting let me know if you had a problem or discovered an error so i can fix it also i would appreciate if you share your image of the cardigan with us here thank you fellow knitters this cardigan is worked top down with raglan increases on the yoke the neck is shaped with short row by using the bobby pin technique the yoke is divided for body and sleeves and the body continued back and forth with circular needle the sleeves are worked in the round with magic loop technique sizes xs - s - m - l xl finished measurements the sizes xs s m l xl are designed to fit an approximate bust circumference of 80-85 85-90 90-95 95-100 100-110 cm 31½-33½ 33½-35½ 35½-37½ 37½-39½ 39½-43¼ inches the cardigan is designed to have approx 5-10 cm 2-4 inches of positive ease materials 1100 1200 1300 1400 1600 yards yarn weight 4 medium-worsted or category c by drops yarn shown here in baby rainbow yarn by loops & threads 100% polyester 5 3 oz / 150 g = 364 yds / 333 m 3 3 4 4 5 skeins needles circular needles 5 mm us8 and 3 5 mm us4 gauge 18 sts x 24 row in stockinette stitch on 5 mm us8 needles = 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 inches
